website_summaries.verdict: High-quality leather cover softball that will give you a good lifespan.
pros: Slightly raised seams are perfect to allow fast-pitch pitchers to gain a grip
High-density polyurethane center ensures ball will last longer
cons: These balls can be a little more expensive than some others

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on cheaper softballs that change form and become mushy after a few uses. These balls have great compression, keep their shape, and have fantastic raised seems which is perfect for those looking for a pitching ball. I have tried about every ball out there, and these are one of my favorites
customer_reviews.author: Matt Millhollin

customer_reviews.title: Great softballs.!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these 12" balls for my girls hitting lessons. I wanted them to have real game balls so they could get that "crack of the bat" sound when they hit. These definitely do that. This in turn motivates my girls to hit even more. The covers are tough and durable and are nothing like like those cheesy synthetic covered balls. I see these lasting a long time in our cage. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: ABQMK2

customer_reviews.title: Decent at best
customer_reviews.text: Have demoted these balls to tee and soft toss/net use only. Would have returned if hadn't opened. Seem big in the hand (maybe due to laces). Do not seem to come off the bat as well as others.
customer_reviews.author: CarrieB

customer_reviews.title: My daughter prefers the Thunder Heat softballs.
customer_reviews.text: The Thunder Heat have good threads for pitching, and the have a good feel even when new. They are also very durable and their used by many travel teams.
customer_reviews.author: FORSAN

customer_reviews.title: High quality softballs for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: We have used all the major brands of softballs and these look, feel, and are as durable as any we’ve tried over the years and price point was better.
customer_reviews.author: Cristin

customer_reviews.title: top of the line
customer_reviews.text: ASA dimensional specs...leather casing...raised seams...very high expectations of service life
customer_reviews.author: G. Maupin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality balls, worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality balls. They hold up well, have a good pop, nice sound when their hit right. I use them with my 13 year old travelball player. She hits arounf 50 of these balls of the tee and 50 softtosses 3x a week. So far they've held up well.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great softballs. So far they have withstood wear and tear of several practices. I'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Six-stringin'

customer_reviews.title: Decent fastpitch ball
customer_reviews.text: Decent fastpitch softballs. Raised laces. Not tournament game balls but good for practice.
customer_reviews.author: Rey Rey G.

customer_reviews.title: Great ball. They are for our indoor facility and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great ball. They are for our indoor facility and work great with the Hack Attack pitching machine that requires leather balls.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: The laces are nice and high like our pitcher like. They are good construction and a deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dabber

customer_reviews.title: Husband liked them!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for practice if you want a fastpitch, game ball experience/reaction.
customer_reviews.author: lmrduran

customer_reviews.title: Great for pitching practice
customer_reviews.text: These balls are reasonably priced for my daughter’s pitching practice. The leather cover gives her the feel of the game balls, without the cost of the official league balls.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: High quality softballs that last for those who use them 3+ times per week.
customer_reviews.author: Tom P.

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: I coach a university level women's fast pitch team. These balls have held up well after six practices this spring. These are much better balls than the less expensive MacGregor X100 balls.
customer_reviews.author: Ray J

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: These softballs are a great value for the money! I purchased these along with another brand at the same time and practiced with them both. This brand definitely holds up much better!!! I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid softballs
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I’ve bought every 12 inch leather softball out. Can’t go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: Travis patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used them a lot yet but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: JKJK

customer_reviews.title: Appear to be factory seconds/rejects
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality; 7 of 12 had significant imperfections; only 5 will be able to be used as game balls; appear to be factory seconds/rejects; Will not buy from this seller again
customer_reviews.author: Jerry K. Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: Balls are holding up real well. Daughter has been hitting them off and over HR fence on regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Nice seams
customer_reviews.text: I've previously purchased a dozen 12" MacGregor Little League leather balls which were very good (and basically game balls for Little League). How balls vanish, I will never know. These were somewhat more expensive, but had slightly higher seams which my daughter (a pitcher) liked a little better (and they are similar if not identical to the game balls used in her travel games). I liked that they were basically the same as the travel game balls, but for Little League pitching or any other use, you won't regret saving a few bucks and getting the MacGregor 12" leather Little League balls. If you want to get balls that are 'travel game balls', this is a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Dudley makes great softballs!
customer_reviews.text: These are great softballs. They keep their shape and the cover holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: EZ Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Good for pitching.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 dozen for my daughter to learn how to pitch with. Real leather and good seams for her to get a good grip.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron M. Ringus

customer_reviews.title: good ball. served it's purpose in our tourney and ...
customer_reviews.text: good ball. served it's purpose in our tourney and held up well.
customer_reviews.author: lking

customer_reviews.title: Nice seams for pitching practice.
customer_reviews.text: My pitcher daughter loves this because of the seams. We recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of Two

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best softballs for fastpitch. Great quality. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Big Mama

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good seams, currently using for pitching practice. Can't speak to durability for hitting.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great gameball at best price
customer_reviews.text: Great ball at the best price delivered/arrived quickly. I will be a repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: Twanda S. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A very good ball with raised seams. Pitchers love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Grip!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is moving up from 11 inch to 12 inch and is a pitcher, these balls are high quality and have great raised seams, the grip of the ball has helped her with this transition.She loves her dudley's!
customer_reviews.author: Mike L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All I wanted!! Well packaged and everything thank you I will be see you again!
customer_reviews.author: Ezequiel Moreno Jr

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Softball
customer_reviews.text: This is arguably the best softball on the market today. We use these balls for teaching pitching and throwing technique. The leather cover makes them ideal for gripping and teaching new pitches.
customer_reviews.author: Veritas513

customer_reviews.title: Technically, it's the lightning that would be hot
customer_reviews.text: These are good, solid, durable balls. We've been on a few teams that use them for practice. You don't see a lot of damage to the leather and I haven't seen any that got soft. Not our favorite for pitching but good for hitting and fielding.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff H

customer_reviews.title: GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Good product. The right size for OFFICIAL fastpitch softball same. the ball is heavier than the NCAA game ball I am use to using and the ball is a little slippery, but still a decent ball.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Falcon

product_meta.title: Dudley ASA Thunder Heat Fastpitch Softball - 12 Pack, Yellow (4A147YA)
product_meta.description:
Feel the weight, study the grip, and play like a pro with the ASA THUNDER HEAT Polycore Softball. Technologically advanced for superior play, this is the ball for your fastpitch game.

BRAND STORY
A Division of Russell Brands, LLC, Spalding is the largest basketball equipment supplier in the world, and America's first baseball company. Spalding is the official basketball of the National Basketball Association (NBA) and Women's National Basketball Association (WNBA), the official backboard of the NBA and NCAA, the official baseball of the Little League World Series, the official volleyball of the King of the Beach Volleyball Tour and of the "Pro Beach Series" and the official football of Pop Warner. In addition to being a leading producer and marketer of basketballs, footballs, volleyballs and soccer balls, Spalding produces softballs under the Dudley brand. The SPALDING® and DUDLEY® trademarks are owned by Russell Brands, LLC.
feature_bullets: Leather cover provides improved grip and protection
